definition: to gesticulate while talking (idiom); to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily/also written 指手畫腳|指手画脚
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
variant of 角[jue2]/role

sentences.english: Don't let them jerk you around.
sentences.chinese: 别让他们对你指手划脚的。

sentences.english: say anything I want to say, without anybody telling me what to do.
sentences.chinese: 说任何我想说的话，不需要别人来对我指手划脚。

sentences.english: I'd finger paint more, and point the fingers less.
sentences.chinese: 我要少对他指手划脚，却多多抓着他的小手一起画画。

sentences.english: I often condescending, disdain for everything, gesticulating at home.
sentences.chinese: 我常常居高临下，傲视一切，在家里指手划脚。

sentences.english: They give you advice and criticism, and they aren't always polite.
sentences.chinese: 他们会对你的画指手划脚，而且不一定客气。

sentences.english: Furthermore, she always found fault with the merchandise and prices.
sentences.chinese: 而且，她还总对商品和价格指手划脚。

definition: to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
to make thoughtless remarks (idiom)/to criticize/gossip
to blame unscrupulously
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
lit. to shout out hoping for fives and sixes when gambling with dice; a hubbub of gambling
lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame

lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/to remark upon a person's appearance/nitpicking/overcritical/judgmental
lit. to discuss sb's merits and demerits (idiom); to gossip
to call to come and shout to go (idiom); to yell orders/always bossing people around
to pick on sth incessantly (idiom)/to criticize right and left
pinyin: heng2 tiao1 bi2 zi5 shu4 tiao1 yan3

definition: to prattle on self-importantly (idiom)
to gossip and meddle/to shoot one's mouth off/talkative
to make idle remarks about a woman's appearance (idiom)
to scowl fiercely/to glare
to fiddle with/to play and move sth about/to show off (what one can do)/to parade (one's capabilities)/to cause trouble
